info.description: API to retrieve the external user details
info.title: External User Administration

ebExternalUser.description: application holding details about users of the system who are not staff of the bank. Examples include Internet banking users.

name.description: Name of the Customer or Bank Employee or a Person

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

statusChangeReason.description: Customer status update with respective reasons

arrangementId.description: The unique identifier of an arrangement contract.

loginMethod.description: The type of login method e.g. password, PIN, OTP

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

termsAccepted.description: Defines whether the user has accepted the Terms and Conditions first displayed when the user logs in to the system for the very first time.

startTime.description: The beginning of the time interval in the current Day

endTime.description: The end of the time interval in corresponding Day

userType.description: The type of the user. Can be CORPORATE, INTERMEDIARY,PERSONAL

claimStatus.description: Status update of the claim records

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

productLineId.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

languageId.description: Represents the language code of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

dateFormat.description: Used for deciding in which format the dates are to be displayed for a user / for a language

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.
The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified.

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

inputter.description: The user identifier who input the transaction
The user identifier who input the transaction

createdAt.description: Contains the time at which the arrangement was created
Contains the time at which the arrangement was created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
